dsOverview.title: NCAR National Hail Research Experiment Radiosondes, 1972-1978 summers

summary.p: This dataset contains data from radiosonde observations made during the National Hail Research Experiment. Upper air data are available for the summers of 1972, 1973, 1974, 1976, and 1978.

creator.name: UCAR/NCAR/CISL/DSS > Data Support Section, Computational and Information Systems Laboratory, National Center for Atmospheric Research, University Corporation for Atmospheric Research
